org.opengis.cite.validation

Class ValidationErrorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.validation.ValidationErrorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<ValidationError>, DOMErrorHandler, ErrorHandler

    public class ValidationErrorHandler
extends Object
implements ErrorHandler, DOMErrorHandler, Iterable<ValidationError>
    A SAX and DOM error handler that collects validation errors raised while verifying the structure and content of XML entities.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • errorsDetected

        public boolean errorsDetected()
        Indicates whether any validation errors have been detected.
        Returns:
        true if validation errors were detected; false otherwise.

      • getErrorCount

        public int getErrorCount()
        Reports the number of errors detected during a validation episode.
        Returns:
        the number of errors.

      • warning

        public void warning(SAXParseException spex)
        Receives notification of a warning.
        Specified by:
        warning in interface ErrorHandler
        Parameters:
        spex - a non-error condition reported by the parser
        See Also:
        ErrorHandler.warning(org.xml.sax.SAXParseException)

      • error

        public void error(SAXParseException spex)
        Receives notification of a recoverable error. Typically this indicates that a validation constraint has been violated.
        Specified by:
        error in interface ErrorHandler
        Parameters:
        spex - a non-fatal error condition reported by the parser
        See Also:
        ErrorHandler.error(org.xml.sax.SAXParseException)

      • fatalError

        public void fatalError(SAXParseException spex)
        Receives notification of a non-recoverable error, such as non-XML content, XML that is not well-formed, or an incorrect encoding declaration.
        Specified by:
        fatalError in interface ErrorHandler
        Parameters:
        spex - A fatal error condition reported by the parser.
        See Also:
        ErrorHandler.fatalError(org.xml.sax.SAXParseException), XML 1.0 (Fourth Edition)

      • handleError

        public boolean handleError(DOMError error)
        Specified by:
        handleError in interface DOMErrorHandler

      • addError

        public void addError(ErrorSeverity severity,
                     String msg,
                     ErrorLocator locator)
        Adds a general validation error.
        Parameters:
        severity - The severity of the error.
        msg - The error message.
        locator - An ErrorLocator instance that provides information regarding the location of the error.

      • addError

        public void addError(ErrorSeverity severity,
                     String msg,
                     String diag,
                     ErrorLocator locator)
        Adds a general validation error with diagnostic information.
        Parameters:
        severity - The severity of the error.
        msg - The error message.
        diag - Supplementary diagnostic information about the error.
        locator - An ErrorLocator instance that provides information regarding the location of the error.

      • addErrors

        public void addErrors(Collection<ValidationError> errors)
        Adds the given collection of validation errors to this handler.
        Parameters:
        errors - A collection of ValidationError objects, each of which encapsulates information about some constraint violation (which are not necessarily related).

      • getErrors

        public List<ValidationError> getErrors()
        Gets the errors reported to this handler.
        Returns:
        A list containing error descriptions.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a concatenation of the summaries of all received errors.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        A consolidated error message.

      • toXml

        public String toXml()

        Returns a simple XML representation of all received errors. The structure is shown below: 

           <errors xmlns='http://www.galdosinc.com/arbitron'>
     <error /> 1..*
   </errors>
        Returns:
        A String containing an XML summary (in no namespace) of all error descriptions.

      • iterator

        public Iterator<ValidationError> iterator()
        Returns an iterator over the validation errors collected by this handler.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<ValidationError>
        Returns:
        a read-only error Iterator for this handler.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Clears all errors and messages.
